infotexts.faction.unitologists.description: Unitologists adamantly believe that the human race was created by the intelligent design of a divine alien agency, and will be reunified after death in Heaven through the power of a sacred artifact known as the Marker.
infotexts.faction.unitologists.shortdescription: The basis of the religion are the Markers, artifacts of unknown origin and purpose. Oddly, many scientists, even Altman himself, have little idea of the Marker's true purpose and origin.
infotexts.faction.coalition.description: The Earth Government Colonial Alliance, also known as EarthGov, is the governing body of Earth and its colonies.
infotexts.faction.coalition.shortdescription: In addition to its administrative, policing, and trade oversight, EarthGov's military arm, the Earth Defense Force, is responsible for defense and traffic control operations.
infotexts.missiondescription.necrooutpostDestroy: We have recently lost contact with [location1] and we suspect that the aliens have killed everyone and detonated the nuclear reactor to blow them up into the sky.
infotexts.missionsuccess.necrooutpostDestroy: The outpost has been successfully destroyed.
infotexts.missionmessage0.necrooutpostDestroy: The outpost has been successfully destroyed. Evacuation from the outpost to complete the mission.
infotexts.missiondescription.necrooutpostassassina: We have recently lost contact with [location1], where we suspect alien beings are nesting. Find all the eggs in the outpost and destroy them.
infotexts.missionsuccess.necrooutpostassassinate: The outpost's nest has been successfully destroyed.
infotexts.missionfailure.necrooutpostassassinate: The alien creatures at the outpost were not all killed.
infotexts.missionmessage0.necrooutpostassassinate: The outpost's nest has been successfully destroyed. Evacuate from the outpost to complete the mission.
infotexts.entitydescription.necroblood: Blood that reeks with the stench of decay. Highly infectious.
infotexts.entitydescription.necroticeggs: You see a yellow glow when you flick the glass. Highly lethal.
infotexts.entitydescription.quarantinesiren: A custom siren that can alert your crew to lockdown.
infotexts.entitydescription.selfdestructsiren: A 60 second countdown siren to implement on submarines with self destruct capabilities.
infotexts.entitydescription.alarmbuzzer2: A custom alarm buzzer with a different sound.
infotexts.entitydescription.gassink: Install in a room to create a gas chamber.
infotexts.entitydescription.nucleardetonator: Ignites a nuclear detonation everytime it's activated.
infotexts.entitydescription.authchip: Grants access to the self destruct panel in the R25 USS Ishimura submarine.
infotexts.entitydescription.redmarker: Has a mysterious aura. Makes you feel severe discomfort.
infotexts.entitydescription.redmarkerdead: Instant death of all live, kills the server.
infotexts.entitydescription.EnergyammunitionDS: General-purpose ammunition for energy weapons, which can provide a good amount of energy
infotexts.entitydescription.MetalammunitionDS: General-purpose ammunition for live-fire weapons, providing a decent amount of ammunition
infotexts.entitydescription.rageGatling: Powerful firepower, horrific 200 round capacity, enough to shred most creatures, but unfortunately requires power armor to fully harness. Use of metal ammunition
infotexts.entitydescription.GuardShieldedpistol: A medium-sized pistol with a shield that blocks projectiles and shoots small explosive rounds from the muzzle, which is quite powerful. Use metal ammunition
infotexts.entitydescription.stillLaserRifle: Silent energy weapon, three shots can kill the enemy very well, accuracy and recoil is also excellent. Use of energy ammunition
infotexts.entitydescription.destructionIndividualL: Powerful energy weapons, the launch of high-energy particle beam can even penetrate the wall to kill the enemy, of course, the recoil force is also proportional to the power, you need power armor to fully harness. Use of energy ammunition
infotexts.entitydescription.divingsuit2: "A lightweight space suit designed to protect its wearer from prolonged radiation exposure; typically worn by private-sector salvage operators."
infotexts.entitydescription.divingsuit4: The Infected Advanced Soldier RIG is a fatigue and body armor assembly that was designed for combat use and is standard issue protective wear for the EDF Marines and Sailors.
infotexts.entitydescription.spacepowerarmourEX: Heavy space power armor that is safe in harsh environments, can be used underwater, has high defensive power and is equipped with sonar and infrared detectors
infotexts.entitydescription.pulserifle: The Pulse Rifle is a military-grade, triple-barreled assault rifle with a rapid rate of fire and large magazine ammunition capacity.
infotexts.entitydescription.pulseround: Pulse rifle ammunition used for crafting magazines.It can also be used as a grenade
infotexts.entitydescription.pulsemag: Pulse rifle magazine to be inserted in a pulse rifle.
infotexts.entitydescription.MatadorAssaultrifle: "The Matador is a remarkably unique weapon, an assault rifle with an Under Barrel mounted flamethrower that aids with its crowd control ability. It's versatility makes the Matador a preferred weapon for a large number of fighting forces, even against more... Alien opponents."
infotexts.entitydescription.plasmacutter2: This Plasma Cutter combines power and reliability in a portable package.
infotexts.entitydescription.plasmaround: Plasma ammunition used for crafting magazines.It can also be used as a grenade
infotexts.entitydescription.plasmamag: Plasma magazine to be inserted in 211-V Plasma Cutters.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.necroinfection: They have become irrational and their speech is nonsensical. They have become violent beyond reasoning.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.necroinfectio: You have transformed into a necromorph.
infotexts.makeuswhole_goalinfotext_2: Sacred blood of the necromorph has been hidden behind a loose vent. Find this blood quickly before someone else stumbles upon them!
infotexts.makeuswhole_objectivesuccessmessage2: A rush of pleasure hits you like a wave as you find the blood. A dry, mad laugh echoes within your head for a moment, fading into hallucinations of the new world.
infotexts.makeuswhole_objectivesuccessmessage3: Your head spins and your vision narrows as the last of the calyxanide is destroyed.
infotexts.makeuswhole_goalinfotext_4: All on this sub must partake of communion with the necromorph!
infotexts.altmanbepraised_goalinfotext_1: Find a very special egg, possibly hidden in one of the vents.
infotexts.altmanbepraised_objectivesuccessmessage1: The egg disgusts you, but fits neatly in your pocket. Altman be praised!
infotexts.altmanbepraised_goalinfotext_2: Find a safe place for the egg to grow, and feed it [catalystitem].
infotexts.altmanbepraised_objectivesuccessmessage2: The egg bulges and makes strange noises... You're about to become a parent!
infotexts.altmanbepraised_traitorobjectivestartmes: The egg cracks and an infector bursts forth:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.altmanbepraised_goalinfotext_3: See to it by any means that the infector survives for at least 3 minutes.
infotexts.altmanbepraised_objectivesuccessmessage3: You have done well fellow unitologist. Give your body to them and become one with the marker.
infotexts.necro_1_traitorobjectivestartmessage1: It's time. As the your unitologist brethren instructed you back on the loading dock at Minos Linea, you get to work:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.necro_1_goalinfotext_1: Search the emergency supplies lockers in each compartment. An operative has hidden a button component in one of them.
infotexts.necro_1_objectivesuccessmessage1: You quickly stash the button in your pocket and try to act casual.
infotexts.necro_1_traitorobjectivestartmessage2: Next, you'll need to find some explosives before anyone else can get to them!\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.necro_1_goalinfotext_2: Retrieve the explosives from the medbay.
infotexts.necro_1_objectivesuccessmessage2: The plan is coming together perfectly. You grab the explosives and try not to giggle too much.
infotexts.necro_1_traitorobjectivestartmessage3: Finally, the unitologists said you'll need to find something to set this all off!\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.necro_1_goalinfotext_3: Search the steel storage cabinets around the sub and retrieve the detonator.
infotexts.necro_1_objectivesuccessmessage3: The operative really came through! You have all you need now to get the party here started.
infotexts.necro_1_traitorobjectivestartmessage4: You're going to need to set the detonator on a wall in a good location, place the button a safe distance away, wire the two together, then set it all off to flood this rust bucket!\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.necro_1_objectivesuccessmessage4: There's more than enough water in the sub now to end its mission prematurely. You wonder how long it will take to swim to the nearest outpost and report back to the unitologists...
infotexts.necromvptraitormissionstartinfotext: A voice within your head screams loudly enough to startle you: THE CHURCH OF UNITOLOGY CALLS YOU TO SERVICE!
infotexts.necromvptraitorobjectivestartmessage1: An idea gradually forms in your mind, strangely seductive to you in spite of its mundane nature:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.necromvp_goalinfotext_1: Search the storage lockers—a special message just for you is hidden under one of the spare oxygen tanks.
infotexts.necromvpobjectivesuccessmessage1: As you somehow predicted, a slip of filthy paper is stuck to the underside of this oxygen tank. It's covered in primitive scribbles, but you intuitively understand it to be coded instructions.
infotexts.necromvpobjectivesuccessmessage2: A rush of pleasure hits you like a wave as you complete the first task on the paper. A dry, mad laugh echoes within your head for a moment, fading into hallucinations of the new world.
infotexts.necromvptraitorobjectivestartmessage3: You read the next coded instruction:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.necromvpobjectivesuccessmessage3: With that, there is nothing more to do. The sub is in disarray, the voice in your head grows silent, and your fate is sealed.
infotexts.missiondescription.killnecros: A research team sent out by the USG Ishimura has sent out a distress signal before going radio silent between [location1] and [location2]. All attempts to establish communication with the missing team have failed as no one is responding to comms. Find the missing crew and bring them back to the Ishimura safely.
infotexts.missionmessage0.killnecros: The missing crew members seem to have been overwhelmed by parasitic alien life and had to be terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern and report back to the Ishimura.
infotexts.missiondescription.killnecros2: A research team sent out by the USG Ishimura has sent out a distress signal before going radio silent between [location1] and [location2]. All attempts to establish communication with the missing team have failed as no one is responding to comms. Find the missing crew and bring them back to the Ishimura safely.
infotexts.missionmessage0.killnecros2: The missing crew members seem to have been overwhelmed by parasitic alien life and had to be terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern and report back to the Ishimura.
infotexts.missiondescription.killbabynecros: It has been discovered that necromorphs have been multiplying on Europa in an attempt to claim the moon. A nest of young necromorphs has been discovered between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits will be rewarded to any crew that can clear the nest of the infestation and return back safely.
infotexts.missionmessage0.killbabynecros: The infestation has slowed down but continues to spread elsewhere. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
infotexts.missiondescription.seismicactivity: There have been peristent tremors occuring between [location1] and [location2]. It is believed that a group of Molochs may be colliding against cave walls. This may result in a cave-in so it is advisable to steer clear of this route until the threat is dealt with.
infotexts.missionsuccess.seismicactivity: Just keep swimming. Just keep swimming...
infotexts.missionheader0.seismicactivity: You may want to start swimming now.
infotexts.missionmessage0.seismicactivity: Just keep swimming. Just keep swimming. Just keep swimming. Just keep swimming. Just keep swimming.
infotexts.missiondescription.cargobiohazards: The Church of Unitology at [location1] need someone to smuggle some unmarked contraband to [location2] for a reward of [reward] credits no questions asked.
infotexts.missionsuccess.cargobiohazards: The contraband has been successfully delivered.
infotexts.eventtext.fetalaccident.c1: You hear glass break and a shrieking infant child. Upon further inspection you find broken glass and an unknown fluid spilled all over the floor. What the hell?
infotexts.eventtext.fetalaccident.o1.c1: You pickup the broken glass and leave a wet floor sign you found against the wall. The janitor walked in on your action and thanks you. As he leaves, you steal his wallet with 1000 marks!
infotexts.eventtext.fetalaccident.o1.c2: As you pick up the broken glass, you accidentally slice your thumb open and bleed all over the floor. The janitor is upset at the extra work you created.
infotexts.eventtext.fetalaccident.o2: Look up towards the direction the glass mysteriously fell from.
infotexts.eventtext.fetalaccident.o2.c1: THERE'S A BABY ON THE CEILING!
infotexts.eventtext.fetalaccident.o3.c1: Seems it might have just been in your head... These outposts can get on your nerves after a while.
infotexts.eventtext.fetalaccident.o3.c2: You decide you don’t have time for this nonsense and kick the glass. Not your problem! Whatever it is, someone else will sort that out, like the good for nothing janitor!
infotexts.eventtext.fetalaccident.o3.c3: You decide you don’t have time for this nonsense and pretend you didn't see anything, but you get the nagging feeling you've not seen the end of this yet...
infotexts.EventText.unitologistscultambush.c1: Three sightless men lean over, hands reaching into their clothes as if to take out something, and you feel in danger.
infotexts.EventText.unitologistscultambush.o1.c1: You quickly interrupted their movements, the three men pulled out their knives and rushed towards you
infotexts.EventText.unitologistscultambush.o1.c2: Three people pulled out syringes from their clothes to inject themselves with an unknown liquid
infotexts.EventText.unitologistscultambush.o2: “Life is transformed into a whole, one body, one mind, so that we are whole and one”
infotexts.EventText.unitologistscultambush.o2.c1: They stop, apologize for their actions, and then the three of you have a creeper cocktail together. A laugh. They tell you they'll attack the outpost next and give you a little gift.
infotexts.EventText.unitologistscultambush.o2.c2: Three people pulled out syringes from their clothes to inject themselves with an unknown liquid
infotexts.EventText.Growl.c1: You hear glass break and a roar. Upon further inspection, you find that a piece of broken glass and an unknown liquid has just splashed in front of the door, what happened
infotexts.EventText.Growl.o1.c1: You pick up the broken glass and leave a mark on the wall with a wet floor. The janitor walks in on you, "Thank you.”
infotexts.EventText.Growl.o1.c2: When you pick up the broken glass, you accidentally cut your thumb and it bleeds, and the blood from the glass enters the wound.
infotexts.EventText.Growl.o2.c1: 一After the second slam, the thing behind the door seems to be gone, and when you really breathe a sigh of relief, you find that something is crawling out of the ventilation pipe
infotexts.EventText.Growl.o2.c2: Just as you are about to close the door, the monster crashes right out and you are surrounded by three monsters
infotexts.EventText.Growl.o3.c1: You fought tooth and nail to escape from the scene and intended to leave the site immediately
infotexts.EventText.Growl.o3.c2: Just as you are planning to escape, the monster crashes right out and you are surrounded by three monsters
infotexts.EventText.EnhancedSlasheroutbreak.c1: Groups of panicked fellows run past you, "They've escaped!!!" And you pick up their slipped medals by hand and think about what to do now
infotexts.jobdescription.securityofficer: Since Isaac Clark is only an engineer and not a soldier, the main weapons in the game are converted mining tools.
infotexts.talentdescription.spacepowerarmourreform: It is possible to place[itemname]Add sonar。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.spacepowerarmouren: Significant increase in defense and decrease in speed
infotexts.entitydescription.plasmacutter2combat: The plasma cutter combines power and reliability in a portable carry.
infotexts.entitydescription.plasmarounds: 211-V Plasma core shot from plasma cutting machine
infotexts.missiondescription.salvageobelisk1: There are many reports that,Sailors passing[location1]When you feel restless and impulsive.It is said that the Seal of God is always affecting the creatures nearby, so please investigate and retrieve the Seal of God as soon as possible.
infotexts.missionsuccess.salvageobelisk1: Red marker has been successfully retrieved.
infotexts.missionfailure.salvageobelisk1: Failed to retrieve the divine seal.
infotexts.missionmessage0.salvageobelisk1: The Seal of God is now on the boat. Take the submarine out of the hole and collect the reward.
infotexts.missiondescription.salvageobelisk2: There have been numerous reports of sailors feeling uneasy and violent while passing by [location1]. It is believed that an obelisk nearby has been infecting passing sailors. Investigate and retrieve the obelisk.
infotexts.missionsuccess.salvageobelisk2: The divine seal has been successfully recovered.
infotexts.missionfailure.salvageobelisk2: Failed to recover the divine seal.
infotexts.missionmessage0.salvageobelisk2: The Red marker is now on the boat. Take the submarine out of the hole and collect the reward.
infotexts.missiondescription.Ishimura: deliver the artifact to the next facility[location2]Further Research
infotexts.missionsuccess.Ishimura: The seal of God has been delivered.
infotexts.missionmessage0.Ishimura: The Red marker safely delivered, so go get your reward.
infotexts.missiondescription.Ishimura: Exploration ship finds unknown alien object, hopes someone will take it with them[location2]Further Research
infotexts.missionsuccess.Ishimura: The Red marker has been delivered.
infotexts.missionmessage0.Ishimura: The Red marker is safely delivered, so go get your reward.
infotexts.entitydescription.redmarkerMission: The Marker seal commissioned to be delivered has a mysterious force field that will make you feel seriously uncomfortable.
